fields.name: NEBNext® Ultra™ II DNA Library Prep
fields.explanation: Fragmented DNA is used to prepare indexed libraries.
fields.input_requirements: 500 pg - 1 µg of fragmented dsDNA (ideally 200-400 bp), min. 15 µl

fields.name: Nextera® DNA Sample Preparation
fields.explanation: fragmentation and adaptor ligation in a single step (tagmentation), PCR to provide single- or dual-indexed libraries
fields.input_requirements: 50 ng high molecular weight genomic DNA
fields.comments:
can be used for: large/complex Genome sequencing
Not provided by Genomics CF

fields.name: Nextera® XT DNA Sample Prep
fields.explanation: fragmentation and adaptor ligation in a single step (tagmentation), subsequent PCR to provide indexed libraries.
fields.input_requirements: 0.125 - 1 ng of DNA,  min. 15 µl

fields.name: Illumina mRNA Ligation
fields.explanation: mRNA enrichment with poly-T oligo attached magnetic beads. RT with dUTP incorporation for strand specificity. .
fields.input_requirements: 25 ng - 1 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 15 µl
fields.comments: Previously isolated mRNA can also serve as starting material.

fields.name: Illumina Total RNA Ligation
fields.explanation: Removal of rRNA using DNA probes that are subsequently enzymatically digested. A bead-based purification steps removes the digested RNA. RT is performed with dUTP incorporation for strand specificity.
fields.input_requirements: 1 ng - 1 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 15 µl

fields.name: SMART-Seq v4 Ultra Low Input
fields.explanation: double-stranded full length cDNA preparation (dT-priming), Conversion of cDNA into indexed libraries using i.e. Nextera DNA library preparation
fields.input_requirements: 10 pg - 10 ng total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8

fields.name: DNA Quality Control
fields.input_requirements: At least 5 µl
fields.comments: Not a protocol. It's a special entry used for the initial quality check for any kind of DNA samples.

fields.name: RNA Quality Control
fields.input_requirements: At least 5 µl
fields.comments: Not a protocol. It's a special entry used for the initial quality check for any kind of RNA samples.

fields.name: Chromium Multiome 3' GE
fields.explanation: Gene expression and ATAC will be performed within the same nucleus. Two different pools for sequencing will be prepared.
fields.input_requirements: 500 - 10000 nuclei in 2-5 µl
fields.comments: User guidelines and Sample submission form must be signed and brought to Genomics. Please create two projects; one for ATAC-seq and one for Gene expression.

fields.name: Ovation Ultralow System V2
fields.explanation: Fragmented DNA is used to prepare indexed libraries.
fields.input_requirements: 10 pg -100 ng fragmented dsDNA, min. 15 µl

fields.name: xGen ssDNA Library Prep
fields.explanation: Library preparation for ssDNA and low input DNA
fields.input_requirements: 10 pg - 250 ng fragmented DNA, min. 20 µl
fields.typical_application: ChIP, Cut & Run, DRIP, DIP, RIP

fields.name: Chromium Multiome ATAC-seq
fields.explanation: Gene expression and ATAC will be performed within the same nucleus. Two different pools for sequencing will be prepared.
fields.input_requirements: 500 - 10000 nuclei in 2-5 µl
fields.comments: User guidelines and Sample submission form must be signed and brought to Genomics. Please create two projects; one for ATAC-seq and one for Gene expression.

fields.name: Chromium Multiome Nuclei Hashing
fields.explanation: Gene expression and ATAC will be performed within the same nucleus. Samples can be pooled as nuclei from different samples are labeled individually.
fields.input_requirements: 500 - 10000 labeled nuclei per sample, Max 5 µl for all multiplexed samples together.
fields.comments: User guidelines and Sample submission form must be signed and brought to Genomics.

fields.name: Chromium Single Cell 3ʹ GE
fields.explanation: Gene expression of single cells
fields.input_requirements: 700 - 1200 cells/µl, at least 1000 in total, cell viability > 90%
fields.comments: User guidelines and Sample submission form must be signed and brought to Genomics.

fields.name: Chromium Single Cell Fixed RNA
fields.explanation: Gene expression of single cells, Multiplexing of up to 16 samples per reaction
fields.input_requirements: Up to 500000 cells
fields.comments: Sample submission form must be signed and brought to Genomics.

fields.name: NEXTflex Small RNA
fields.explanation: Library preparation for small RNA with a size selection of the libraries using PippinHT.
fields.input_requirements: 1 ng - 2 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 15 µl

fields.name: single cell mRNA library prep with SmartSeq2
fields.explanation: Single cell mRNA library preparation. mRNA enrichment with oligo-dT primer used in the RT step. Prepared DNA is tagmented and indexed. Samples of each plate will be pooled for last cleanup step.
fields.input_requirements: Single cell per well in 96-well plate formate

fields.name: RNA STARR-seq
fields.explanation: Transgene-specific library preparation from total RNA.
fields.input_requirements: 1 - 5 µg of total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 20 µl

fields.name: DNA STARR-seq
fields.explanation: Transgene-specific library preparation from different material (ssDNA, plasmid or viral DNA)
fields.input_requirements: Depending on the input material, min. 20 µl
fields.typical_application: for ssDNA, viral DNA and plasmid DNA, please state in comments which one is required for your project.

fields.name: QuantSeq 3' mRNA
fields.explanation: Gene expression by capturing the 3' end of mRNA
fields.input_requirements: 1 - 500 ng of total RNA, min. 10 µl

fields.name: SMART-Seq mRNA LP
fields.explanation: Gene expression for low input material
fields.input_requirements: 10 pg -100 ng RNA or 1 - 1000 cells

fields.name: TruSeq® mRNA Library Prep
fields.explanation: Gene expression by capturing the polyA tail of mRNA ( dUTP incorporation for strand specificity). Old Illumina kit, will be discontinued.
fields.input_requirements: 100 ng - 1 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 15 µl
fields.comments: Kit will be discontinued by Illumina. Previously isolated mRNA can also serve as starting material.

fields.name: NEXTflex Small RNA with RppH
fields.explanation: RppH treatment to decap RNA prior to library preparation.
fields.input_requirements: 1 ng - 2 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 15 µl

fields.name: NEXTflex Small RNA with T4 PNK
fields.explanation: T4 PNK treatment to produce 3′-OH or 5′-P ends prior to library preparation.
fields.input_requirements: 1 ng - 2 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 15 µl

fields.name: NEBNext® Ultra™ II DNA Library Prep with DNA fragmentation
fields.explanation: DNA is frgamneted using the Covaris system prior to prepare indexed libraries.
fields.input_requirements: 1 ng - 1 µg of fragmented gDNA, mind. 15 µl

fields.name: xGen ssDNA Library Prep with KAPA
fields.explanation: Library preparation for ssDNA and low input DNA. PCR will be performed with KAPA.
fields.input_requirements: 10 pg - 250 ng fragmented DNA, min 20 µl

fields.name: Illumina Total RNA Ligation with ERCC spike-ins
fields.explanation: Removal of rRNA using DNA probes that are subsequently enzymatically digested. A bead-based purification steps removes the digested RNA. RT is performed with dUTP incorporation for strand specificity.  ERCC spike-ins are used as internal normalizatio
fields.input_requirements: 1 ng - 1 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 15 µl

fields.name: Illumina mRNA Ligation with ERCC spike-ins
fields.explanation: mRNA enrichment with poly-T oligo attached magnetic beads. RT with dUTP incorporation for strand specificity. ERCC spike-ins are used as internal normalization control.
fields.input_requirements: 25 ng - 1 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 15 µl
fields.comments: Previously isolated mRNA can also serve as starting material.

fields.name: TruSeq® total RNA Library Prep with riboPOOL
fields.explanation: Removal of rRNA using biotinylated, target-specific oligos combined with Ribo-Zero rRNA removal beads. RT is performed with dUTP incorporation for strand specificity.
fields.input_requirements: 100 ng - 1 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 7 or higher, min. 15 µl

fields.name: TruSeq® total RNA Library Prep with Ribo-Zero (Gold) Depletion
fields.explanation: Removal of rRNA using biotinylated, target-specific oligos combined with Ribo-Zero rRNA removal beads. RT is performed with dUTP incorporation for strand specificity.
fields.input_requirements: 100 ng - 1 µg total RNA, min. 15 µl

fields.name: Ovation Ultralow System V2 with DNA fragmentation
fields.explanation: DN Ais frgamneted using the Covaris system prior to prepare indexed libraries.
fields.input_requirements: 10 pg -100 ng fragmented dsDNA, min. 15 µl

fields.name: xGen ssDNA Library Prep with DNA fragmentation
fields.explanation: DNA is frgamneted using the Covaris system prior to prepare indexed libraries for ssDNA and low input DNA.
fields.input_requirements: 10 pg - 250 ng fragmented DNA, min. 20 µl
fields.typical_application: ChIP, Cut & Run, DRIP, DIP, RIP

fields.name: GLOE-Seq ver1
fields.input_requirements: At least 3 µg of purified DNA

fields.name: sBLISS
fields.input_requirements: 100 - 200 ng of dsDNA

fields.name: ATAC-seq
fields.explanation: Fragmentation and adaptor ligation in a single step (tagmentation), subsequent PCR to provide indexed libraries.

fields.name: TruSeq® mRNA Library Prep with ERCC spike-ins
fields.explanation: Gene expression by capturing the polyA tail of mRNA ( dUTP incorporation for strand specificity). Old Illumina kit, will be discontinued. ERCC spike-ins are used as internal normalization control.
fields.input_requirements: 100 ng - 1 µg total RNA, RIN/RQN: 8 or higher, min. 15 µl
fields.comments: Kit will be discontinued by Illumina. Previously isolated mRNA can also serve as starting material.

fields.name: TruSeq® total RNA Library Prep with Ribo-Zero (Gold) Depletion with ERCC spike-ins
fields.explanation: Removal of rRNA using biotinylated, target-specific oligos combined with Ribo-Zero rRNA removal beads. RT is performed with dUTP incorporation for strand specificity. ERCC spike-ins are used as internal normalization control.
fields.input_requirements: 100 ng - 1 µg total RNA, min. 15 µl
fields.comments: Kit will be discontinued by Illumina.

fields.name: Native Barcoding Kit V14
fields.explanation: PCR-free library prep method for multiplexing to preserve additional information such as base modifications
fields.input_requirements: 400-1000 ng per sample of gDNA; 200 fmol (130 ng for 1 kb amplicons) per sample of amplicons

fields.name: Ligation Sequencing Kit V14
fields.explanation: PCR-free library prep method  to preserve additional information such as base modifications
fields.input_requirements: 1 µg of gDNA or 100-200 fmol of amplicons or cDNA
